thread.title: BRIEF-B. Riley Financial Announces Offering Of $50 Mln Senior Notes Due 2023

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-B. Riley Financial Announces Offering Of $50 Mln Senior Notes Due 2023
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - B. Riley Financial Inc:
* B. RILEY FINANCIAL ANNOUNCES OFFERING OF $50 MILLION SENIOR NOTES DUE 2023 AND RECEIPT OF INVESTMENT GRADE RATING OF “A-“ FROM EGAN-JONES RATINGS COMPANY
* B. RILEY FINANCIAL - IF CO CONSUMMATES ACQUISITION OF MAGICJACK, CO TO USE A PORTION OF PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING TO FUND A PORTION OF ACQUISITION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
